Title: El Compadre
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Jeffrey Alan Fiskin (written for television by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by)
Actors: Jamie Hector, Ryan Ahern, Sarah Aldrich, Justene Alpert
Plot: Bosch clashes with his fellow detectives. Irving weighs his career options just as his personal life takes a turn. The killers behind the Meadows murder clean up loose ends. Questions swirl about whether Bosch is an avenging angel.
